value.title: Microsoft to divest AnyVision stake, end face recognition investing
value.excerpt: Microsoft Corp on Friday said it would sell its stake in AnyVision, an Israeli facial recognition startup, and said it no longer would make minority investments in companies that sell the controversial technology.

value.title: New AI-powered blood test could reveal lung cancer without a CT scan
value.excerpt: A blood test that uses machine learning to hunt for cancer DNA could reveal lung cancer in patients who otherwise would never have been tested.
